Introduction
This topic contains information on determining marginal employment, including
qualifying criteria for marginal employment
exceptions to the qualifying criteria for marginal employment
, and
factors pertinent to the issue of marginal employment
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Determining Disability, Unemployability, and Marginal Employment for Pension
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
